医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
传统中草药有望对抗阿尔茨海默氏症和帕金森氏症酸枣仁在衰老和痴呆模型中具有神经保护作用，可改善认知功能并减少淀粉样蛋白和 tau 蛋白病理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Traditional-Chinese-herb-shows-promise-against-Alzheimere28099s-and-Parkinsone28099s.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Traditional-Chinese-herb-shows-promise-against-Alzheimere28099s-and-Parkinsone28099s.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adc218dd-76d7-49f3-ad50-969ebf4003aa Fri, 08 Nov 2024 06:40:00 -0500 Traditional Chinese herb shows promise against Alzheimer’s and Parkinson’s
研究确定了持久髋关节植入物的最佳材料布里斯托大学领导的一项新研究发现，采用 Delta 陶瓷或氧化锆头以及高度交联聚乙烯内衬或杯的髋关节植入物在术后 15 年内翻修风险最低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Research-identizes-best-materials-for-long- permanent-hip-implants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Research-identizes-best-materials-for-long- permanent-hip-implants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c7f36f2-96cb-4059-95a0-a5676929d82c Fri, 08 Nov 2024 06:38:49 -0500 Research identifies best materials for long-lasting hip implants
肠道细菌变化可能预示类风湿性关节炎新研究表明，类风湿性关节炎发生之前肠道微生物组的变化可能为预防性治疗提供机会之窗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Gut-bacteria-changes-may-foreshadow-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Gut-bacteria-changes-may-foreshadow-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc84ba3d-ecec-4cfc-baad-e635b318220a Fri, 08 Nov 2024 06:28:06 -0500 Gut bacteria changes may foreshadow rheumatoid arthritis
正在招募针对呼吸道病毒的新疫苗的临床试验一项临床试验正在进行招募，测试采用昆士兰大学分子钳技术生产的候选疫苗针对危及生命的呼吸道病毒的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Recruitment-underway-for-a-clinical-trial-testing-new-vaccine-against-respiratory-viruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Recruitment-underway-for-a-clinical-trial-testing-new-vaccine-against-respiratory-viruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8acecfd-cd65-4e4d-9a93-37a1134010ab Fri, 08 Nov 2024 06:16:59 -0500 Recruitment underway for a clinical trial testing new vaccine against respiratory viruses
工作压力与心血管健康状况不佳有关研究表明，与工作相关的压力会对心血管健康产生负面影响，对不同成年人群的健康行为和结果产生影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Work-lated-stress-linked-to-poor-cardioangio-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Work-lated-stress-linked-to-poor-cardioangio-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2872f944-b224-4805-a2d0-e43a6742d68a Fri, 08 Nov 2024 06:10:00 -0500 Work-related stress linked to poor cardiovascular health
加州将 Medi-Cal 扩大到未经授权的居民。结果好坏参半。加州今年迈出了最后一步，向每一位符合资格的居民开放 Medi-Cal（医疗补助计划），无论其移民身份如何。对于已经很庞大的安全网计划来说，这是一次重大扩展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/California-expanded-Medi-Cal-to-unauthorized-residents-The-results-are-mixed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/California-expanded-Medi-Cal-to-unauthorized-residents-The-results-are-mixed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d822c569-d703-4342-a756-712245feb424 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 06:00:03 -0500 California expanded Medi-Cal to unauthorized residents. The results are mixed.
监管机构呼吁对 Medicare Advantage 家访进行更严格的审查一项新的联邦监管机构审计正在加大对政府官员的压力，要求他们打击与医疗保险优势上门服务相关的数十亿美元的多收费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Watchdog-calls-for-tighter-scrutiny-of-Medicare-Advantage-home-visits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Watchdog-calls-for-tighter-scrutiny-of-Medicare-Advantage-home-visits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67de435a-b408-4da6-861e-48237bcc7190 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 05:52:08 -0500 Watchdog calls for tighter scrutiny of Medicare Advantage home visits
孕期补充维生素 D 可提高 7 岁以下儿童的骨密度研究表明，怀孕期间补充维生素 D 可对儿童的骨骼健康和瘦体重产生积极影响，并具有潜在的长期益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Pregnancy-vitamin-D-supplementation-boosts-bone-密度-in-kids-up-to-age-7.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Pregnancy-vitamin-D-supplementation-boosts-bone-密度-in-kids-up-to-age-7.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea605ab8-cb37-46dc-8a9e-159147d04a80 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 05:43:00 -0500 Pregnancy vitamin D supplementation boosts bone density in kids up to age 7
年龄、教育和宗教影响尼日利亚老年人的抑郁风险研究表明，孤独和缺乏身体活动是尼日利亚老年人抑郁的关键因素，强调了社交互动的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Age-education-and-religion-impact-depression-risk-among-Nigerian-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Age-education-and-religion-impact-depression-risk-among-Nigerian-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a041a07-4345-424c-906b-7cd548afec8a Fri, 08 Nov 2024 05:11:00 -0500 Age, education, and religion impact depression risk among Nigerian older adults
更环保、更清洁：酵母-绿藻混合物改善水处理https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Greener-And-Cleaner-Yeast-Green-Algae-Mix-Improves-Water-Treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Greener-And-Cleaner-Yeast-Green-Algae-Mix-Improves-Water-Treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72f2b38f-197b-435d-b147-c30841564a72 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 00:41:00 -0500 Greener And Cleaner: Yeast-Green Algae Mix Improves Water Treatment
